entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
